ranks.text: On 9/4 Mishima will text you details about a new side quest, Winners Don't Use Cheats. Pursue this sidequest - through the course of the sidequest you will meet Shinya, the Tower Arcana cooperation.Unlocks Down Shot, an ability that lets you spend an entire magazine to guarantee a knock down on an enemy.Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks Bullet Hail, which gives you a chance to enter a gun all-out-attack after an ambush.Bonus: Kindness Up
choices: Choice 4: "So do I." +3 / "I'll let them know." +3

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Warning Shot, a way to frighten enemies with a threat during demon negotiations to get them to your side.Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Kindness Up
choices: Choice 2: "You seem happy." +3 / "You're so kind." +2 / "Why free?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Ammo Pouch, boosting your maximum bullet capacity for each weapon.Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Cheap Shot, reducing the bullets required for a Down Shot.Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:None! That was easy.Bonus: Kindness Up

Impactful conversation choices for this rank:After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: A Mother's Aggression.Unlocks Electric Slug, boosting the damage inflicted by Bullet Hail.Bonus: Kindness Up
choices: Choice 1: "No, she's not." +2 / "Is that what you think?" +2
Choice 2: "I believe in them" +3 / "It'll all work out." +2

ranks.text: To initiate this rank you must have completed the A Mother's Aggression side quest.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "I'm glad to hear that." +3 / "Thank the Phantom Thieves." +2
Choice 2: "It means you've matured." +3 / "No, that makes sense." +3 / "A little bit, yeah." +2
Choice 3: "He wants to win at all costs."

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.Unlocks Oda Special, allowing Joker's attacks to ignore resistances to hit resistant enemies.
